mean_en: he process of helping somebody to have a normal, useful life again after they have been very ill/sick or in prison for a long time
sentence: William needs months of rehabilitation to walk properly after the surgery.
sentence_trans: 手术后，威廉需要几个月的恢复才能正常走路。
word_etyma: re再 ＋ habilit使适合 ＋ ation表示行为、情况 → rehabilitation复原
